chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In his most daring feat, William tell used his bow to shoot an apple off the head of his son across the water of the bay.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " bending " sound. The original meaning is the bend of water. For example, Bei Zhou Yuxin "Wang Weishui River": "The tree resembles the shore of the new pavilion, and the sand resembles the Longwei Bay." "Book of Jin. "Siyi Biography": "Funan went west to Linyi for more than three thousand miles. In the sea and big bay, it has a vast territory of three thousand miles, and there are palaces and palaces."

" Bay " as a verb means to stop. Such as "Jing Shi Tong Yan. "Yu Boya threw the piano and Xie Zhiyin": "Bo Ya vaguely recognizes the place where the boats met last year. The sailors were paid, the boat was anchored in the bay, the bottom was anchored, and the cliff was nailed." "Water Margin" Chapter 20: "Also divide the boat into two routes and go to live in Luhuadangzhongwan."

" Bay " is also used as a quantifier. For example, in the Tang Dynasty, Qian Qi's "One Hundred Paths of Jiang Xing Untitled", 90: "One bay obliquely shines on the water, three versions of the boat go down the wind." Yuan Metabolism Yingfang "Shuilong Yin": "One bay of flowing water, one cultivation, Tuqiu old."
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " bending " sound. The original meaning is the bend of water.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「彎」聲。本義是水流彎曲處。如北周庾信〈望渭水〉：「樹似新亭岸，沙如龍尾灣。」《晉書．四夷列傳》：「扶南西去林邑三千餘里，在海大灣中，其境廣袤三千里，有城邑宮室。」

　　「灣」作動詞表示停泊。如《警世通言．俞伯牙摔琴謝知音》：「伯牙依稀還認得去年泊船相會子期之處。分付水手，將船灣泊，水底拋錨，崖邊釘橛。」《水滸全傳》第20回：「且把船來分作兩路，去那蘆花蕩中灣住。」

　　「灣」還用作量詞。如唐代錢起〈江行無題一百道〉之九十：「一灣斜照水，三版順風船。」元代謝應芳〈水龍吟〉：「一灣流水，一枝修行，菟裘將老。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「彎」聲。本義是水流彎曲處。

②海岸凹入陸地、便於停船的地方：海灣。港灣。
③使船停住：把船灣住。

灣字的基本解释

灣
wān
见“湾”。

灣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wān］
［《廣韻》烏關切，平删，影。］
“湾1”的繁体字。
(1)水流弯曲处。
(2)海湾。
(3)停泊。
(4)量词。多用于小水。
(5)同“彎”。弯曲。
(6)用于村庄等地名。

灣字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灣； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页664第10
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】烏關切【正韻】烏還切，?音彎。水曲也。【沈佺期詩】舟險萬重灣。　又【韻補】叶于權切，音淵。【白居易·悟眞寺詩】去山四五里，先聞水潺湲。自兹拾車馬，始涉藍溪灣。

灣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
灣字的起名意思

暂无。
